page.title: 11LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: LEGEND OF STRATHMARTINE:_ ________________________ THIS LEGEND ORIGINATES FROM A POPULAR AND WELL BELIEVED STORY. THIS STORY TELLS HOW A LONG TIME AGO A FARMER,WHO OCCUPIED AN ADJOINING FARM WAS BLESSED WITH A FAMILY OF 9 DAUGHTERS .ONE SULTRY SUMMER EVENING AFTER A HARD DAYS WORK IN THE FIELDS,THE FARMER ASKED HIS ELDEST DAUGHTER TO GO TO THE WELL TO GET HIM A DRINK OF WATER.AS SHE DID NOT RETURN AS SOON AS HER FATHER EXPECTED ,HIS SECOND DAUGHTER WAS SENT TO FIND HER SISTER.THE SECOND,LIKE THE FIRST FAILED TO RETURN AND THE THIRD WAS SENT ON THE SAME ERRAND.THIS CONTINUED UNTILL ALL NINE DAUGHTERS HAD BEEN SENT IN SEARCH OF EACH OTHER.THE FARMER WENT IN SEARCH OF HIS FAMILY,AND WHEN HE ARRIVED AT THE SPRING HE FOUND AN ENORMOUS DRAGON
